entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
